*div1 type="summary"* *p*Hanson Alsbury to Austin, June 1, 1827. Reputation of colony rapidly increasing in the United States. Jackson-Adams campaign distressing the country.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Mount Carmel Mi*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="06-01-1827">June 1st 1827*/date_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*Dear Sir I have taken the liberty to enclose to you a letter addressed to my *person_mentioned*Mother*/person_mentioned*, belie veing it to be the only sure means by which she wrould receive it, therefore I desire as a favour specially confered you will forward it so soon as practicable.*/p*
*p*Previous to my departure with my *person_mentioned*wife */person_mentioned*from your *location_mentioned*Colony */location_mentioned*you were pleased to assure me that so soon as the *person_mentioned*Commissioner of the Sale of lands*/person_mentioned* should arrive you would make me a title to my *location_mentioned*portion of lands*/location_mentioned*, being already entitled to it by my citizenship permit me to remind you of your promise and as soon as I can have assurance that by title is made I will remit or bring you the amt of consideration.*/p*
*p*I have nothing new to write you. The character of your *location_mentioned*colony*/location_mentioned* is rapidly increasing in the*location_mentioned* U. S.*/location_mentioned* Our *location_mentioned*union */location_mentioned*is much distressed and agitated by the political canvass for the *person_mentioned*presidency*/person_mentioned*, The *person_mentioned*friends */person_mentioned*both of *person_mentioned*Adams */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Jackson */person_mentioned*are sanguine in their hopes for their friend—The contest in my opinion is quite doubtful—*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Hanson Alsbury*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Stephen F Austin Esq*/person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*Austin Colony Mexico*/location_mentioned**/p*
*p*N B My purpose is as soon as I shall be able to resume my residence in *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned*.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*HA*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
